title: ionet
text: goal ionet develop network functionalities specialized data generated input-output tables.

title: ionet
text: can install development version ionet GitHub :

title: ionet
text: btw(): betweenness centrality measure incorporates available node-specific auxiliary information based strongest path. dijkstra(): implementation Dijkstra’s algorithm find shortest paths source node nodes given network.

title: ionet
text: Xiao, S., Yan, J. Zhang, P. (2022). Incorporating auxiliary information betweenness measure input-output networks. Physica : Statistical Mechanics Applications, 607, 128200. DOI.

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
text: Compute betweenness centrality auxiliary information based strongest path (SP).

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
Betweenness centrality — btw
text: adjmat n--n numerical matrix representing matrix intermediate transactions input-output table. gross n-dimensional numerical vector representing gross input/output. aux n-dimensional numerical vector representing node-specific auxiliary information. alpha scalar (default = 1) 0 1, representing tuning parameter controls weights SP strength auxiliary information. type character string specifying type SP calculate. Available options: type = "consumption" / type = "pull" (default) type = "distribution" / type = "push"

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
text: list betweeness score, associated SPs, SP distance SP strength.

title: Betweenness centrality — btw
text: Xiao, S., Yan, J. Zhang, P. (2022). Incorporating Auxiliary Information Betweenness Measure Input-Output Networks. Physica : Statistical Mechanics Applications, 607, 128200.
